name: Robros (itch) (Shironobe)
description:
ROBROS is a puzzle game, where you take control of your robots to push the blocks, First robot can push other blocks, while the second robot can attract iron blocks using magnets, you can switch between both robots to push all the iron blocks. In Every level, You have to think about how to avoid all the obstacles like pitfalls, Woodblocks, Powerfull magnets in your way to complete your task. This Puzzle game will challenge your mind to think ahead of time and move accordingly in order to not get stuck and push all the iron blocks.

-Use WASD or the arrow keys to move and Space/X to change between     Robots. Your goal is to push all the Iron Blocks to the black hole. 

-Press R to Restart Level.

-You  can control 2 Robots to complete your task. First Robot can move and push other blocks, While the Second Robot can Use magnets to attract blocks, but can not move.
